definition: to stay together/to rely on one another
to guard/to defend/to keep watch/to abide by the law/to observe (rules or ritual)/nearby/adjoining

sentences.english: Unlike most other fish, they are monogamous and mate for life.
sentences.chinese: 不像其他的魚類，它們是一夫一妻制並終生廝守。

sentences.english: I hope we can spend just as many as more years together.
sentences.chinese: 希望我們能天長地久，永遠廝守在一起。

sentences.english: Working is like old-time marriage, obviously you got no happiness, but still you have to live with it.
sentences.chinese: 上班就像舊時代的婚姻，明明不幸福，還得長相廝守。

sentences.english: Possession hinders enjoyment and increase annoyance whethe_r you lend or keep.
sentences.chinese: 佔有總是妨礙享受，徒增煩擾，無論你借出還是廝守。

sentences.english: Always being together is my greatest happiness.
sentences.chinese: 與你長相廝守，是我最大的幸福。

sentences.english: Find amusement when the occasion arises and sincerity, in the heart forever have clear dividing line.
sentences.chinese: 逢場作戲和真心廝守，在心裏永遠有明顯的分界線。

sentences.english: Why am I so scared of that time goes away and can not be allowed stay with you everlastingly .
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼我總害怕時光飛逝而無法與你終生廝守？

sentences.english: Yuan, let us together for a lifetime, days without edges, in which birds must dare and the king must.
sentences.chinese: 媛，讓我們廝守終生，天無棱，鳥飛絕，纔敢與君絕。

sentences.english: If we’ve made plans to get together, we’ve been looking forward to it all day.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們計劃要廝守，肯定早就整天期待了。

sentences.english: He came to your city, in the corner of the carport together for ever figure.
sentences.chinese: 他來到你的城市，在街角車棚裏廝守曾經身影。

sentences.english: Find amusement when the occasion arises and sincerity, always have a clear dividing line in the heart.
sentences.chinese: 逢場作戲和真心廝守，在心裏永遠有明顯的分界線。

sentences.english: One year of service-in exchange for a lifetime with Sabrina.
sentences.chinese: 相形之下，用一年的勞役換來與薩布萊娜廝守終生。

sentences.english: Let's say you've met a great girl, and you want to spend more time with her.
sentences.chinese: 假如你遇見了一位很棒的女孩，想與她長相廝守。

sentences.english: I can't wait to crawl in bed with you tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我快要等不及了，今天晚上要和你一起廝守。

sentences.english: I was in love and ready for a long-term commitment.
sentences.chinese: 我愛他，並準備與他長相廝守。

sentences.english: Rich or poor, we will keep together and be happy in one another.
sentences.chinese: 不論貧富，我們都要廝守一起，共享天倫之樂。

definition: (to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
good karma/opportune connection with marriage partner
to roam far and wide (idiom)/to travel the world
see 有情人終成眷屬|有情人终成眷属[you3 qing2 ren2 zhong1 cheng2 juan4 shu3]
lit. when the seas run dry and the stones go soft (idiom)/fig. forever/until the end of time
lit. heads rubbing together (idiom)/fig. very close relationship
Cowherd and Weaving maid (characters in folk story)/separated lovers/Altair and Vega (stars)
to endure humiliation as part of an important mission (idiom); to suffer in silence
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
rhinoceros horn, reputed to confer telepathic powers/fig. mutual sensitivity/tacit exchange of romantic feelings/a meeting of minds
